metadata.title: CVE-2021-32062 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: MapServer before 7.0.8, 7.1.x and 7.2.x before 7.2.3, 7.3.x and 7.4.xbefore 7.4.5, and 7.5.x and 7.6.x before 7.6.3 does not properly enforcethe MS_MAP_NO_PATH and MS_MAP_PATTERN restrictions that are intended tocontrol the locations from which a mapfile may be loaded (with MapServerCGI).

criterions.comment: mapserver package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
